LanguageData.ARA_MW_Bone_Sword.label: Weapon organ "Bone Sword"
LanguageData.ARA_MW_Bone_Sword.description: It is the basic melee weapon used by Arachne insects, and is connected to the insect's supplementary limbs through multiple exposed nerve bundles.Although it is nothing more than a hard, sword-shaped piece of bone, for Arachne insects, which have infinite strength, there is no problem in cutting down enemies that invade their nests one after another.
LanguageData.ARA_MW_Bone_Sword.tools.0.label: horizontal sweep
LanguageData.ARA_MW_Bone_Sword.tools.1.label: Lower crushing
LanguageData.ARA_MW_Cartilage_Whip.label: Weapon organ "Cultilage Whip"
LanguageData.ARA_MW_Cartilage_Whip.description: It is a melee weapon used by Arachne insects, and the cartilage of each segment is interlaced to form a strong whip.When striking an enemy, this weapon makes a frightening sound, inflicts unbearable pain on the enemy, and effectively pierces the enemy's armored defenses with blunt damage.
LanguageData.ARA_MW_Cartilage_Whip.tools.0.label: whipping
LanguageData.ARA_MW_Scything_Talons.label: Weapon organ "Cystaron"
LanguageData.ARA_MW_Scything_Talons.description: A melee weapon used by Arachne Bugs, it is shaped like a giant sickle and is connected through appendages and nerve bundles. Due to its huge volume, it deals area damage each time it is wielded, allowing it to defeat multiple adjacent targets at once.
LanguageData.ARA_MW_Scything_Talons.tools.0.label: Shakedown
LanguageData.ARA_RW_Basic_Fist_Needle_Gun.label: Weapon organ "fist needle"
LanguageData.ARA_RW_Basic_Fist_Needle_Gun.description: It is a basic long-range weapon used by Arachne insects.It has a fist-shaped appearance and is connected to the insect's supplementary limb by a nerve bundle.This weapon is small and lightweight, and although it has a short range, it fires a line of poisonous needles at the enemy, inflicting penetrating damage.
LanguageData.ARA_RW_Toxic_Needle_MG.label: Weapon organ "Tempest Stinger"
LanguageData.ARA_RW_Toxic_Needle_MG.description: It is a weapon used by Arachne insects, and it has five rows of stinging pipes, and fires a large number of poisonous stingers alternately under command through nerve bundles.Although its accuracy is low, it has a power comparable to that of a human machine gun.
LanguageData.Bullet_ARA_RW_Toxic_Needle_MG.label: poisonous stinger
LanguageData.ARA_RW_Toxic_Needle_SG.label: Weapon organ "Blossom Stinger"
LanguageData.ARA_RW_Toxic_Needle_SG.description: It is a weapon used by Arachne insects. It has two short-range, multi-row pipes, and although its firing accuracy is low, it can fire a large amount of ammunition at once, and has a power comparable to that of a human shotgun.
LanguageData.ARA_Bullet_SniperCannon.label: Arachne thorns
LanguageData.ARA_RW_Basic_SniperCannon_Gun.label: Weapon organ "Blood Rock Spiny Cannon"
LanguageData.ARA_RW_Basic_SniperCannon_Gun.descriptio: It is a large weapon organ of Arachne insects, which has an invasive appearance like a fang, and its mouthparts are connected to a blood chain that grows giant barbs.It is fired with high pressure due to muscle compression, and the spines in the cavity have extremely high destructive power.Inspired by human weapons, the insect group adds accompaniment hormones to the blood chain barbs, increasing the speed of fire by continuing to fire.
LanguageData.ARA_Bullet_Rail.label: Arachne perforation thorns
LanguageData.ARA_RW_Basic_Rail_Gun.label: Weapon organ "Broadblade Speargun"
LanguageData.ARA_RW_Basic_Rail_Gun.description: It is a weapon organ of the Arachne insect group, and although its volume is not very large, the barbed spines fired by muscle compression have extremely high penetrating power and can penetrate enemy troops lined up.Furthermore, small bone blades have been added to the lower jaw, allowing it to counter close-range threats.
LanguageData.ARA_RW_Basic_Rail_Gun.tools.0.label: Slash
LanguageData.ARA_RW_Basic_Acid_Bladder_Gun.label: Weapon organ "Acid Bladder Gun"
LanguageData.ARA_RW_Basic_Acid_Bladder_Gun.descriptio: A basic long-range weapon used by the Arachne Insects, which can spray a liquid arachne acid by momentary compression of its muscles. This acid liquid coats the target and cauterizes any enemies it touches.
LanguageData.ARA_Proj_StrongSludgeSpray_Eco.label: Arachnoid acid solution
LanguageData.ARA_RW_Basic_FireSpewer_Gun.label: Weapon organ "Flame Acid Gun"
LanguageData.ARA_RW_Basic_FireSpewer_Gun.description: It is a large long-range weapon organ of Arachne insects, which has fluid sacs filled with acid glands and strong muscle tubes, and sprays a hot molten air mass of fire and acid in the targeted direction.It covers enemies within range and melts their armor and flesh.
LanguageData.ARA_RW_Acid_Mortar.label: Weapon organ "corrosion mortar"
LanguageData.ARA_RW_Acid_Mortar.description: It is a large long-range weapon used by Arachne insects.The cannon is filled with strong muscle tissue, and when it contracts momentarily, it shoots a mass of acid into the air, bombarding enemy groups from a safe distance.
LanguageData.Bullet_ARA_RW_Acid_Mortar.label: large acid bomb
LanguageData.ARA_RW_Missile_HG_Gun.label: Weapon organ "Double Eye Disaster Gun"
LanguageData.ARA_RW_Missile_HG_Gun.description: It is a basic long-range weapon used by Arachne Bugs, and is shaped like a human handgun and can fire missiles made of explosive seed insects.This weapon has high adaptability and tracking ability, and can demonstrate good performance even for insects who are not good at shooting.
LanguageData.Bullet_RW_Missile_HG_Gun.label: small acid missile
LanguageData.ARA_RW_Missile_AR_Gun.label: Weapon organ "Rapid Disaster Gun"
LanguageData.ARA_RW_Missile_AR_Gun.description: It is a large armed organ of the Arachne insect swarm, and can fire explosive seed insect missiles with overwhelming force. Its powerful firepower is the core of the insect swarm's creation of a flesh-and-blood army.
LanguageData.Bullet_RW_Missile_AR_Gun.label: micro acid missile
LanguageData.ARA_RW_Basic_SkyHive_Gun.label: Weapon organ "Tenshu species' nest"
LanguageData.ARA_RW_Basic_SkyHive_Gun.description: It is a long-range weapon used by Arachne insects, which impregnates a large number of Tensu seeds in its internal cavity, and the Tensu seeds are launched as missiles.These Tensu seeds continue attacking behind the enemy for a certain period of time, and continue attacking even if they are separated from the enemy.
LanguageData.Bullet_ARA_RW_Basic_SkyHive_Gun.label: Arachne Tensu species
LanguageData.ARA_RW_Large_Arc_Gun.label: Weapon organ "Arc Breath Cannon"
LanguageData.ARA_RW_Large_Arc_Gun.description: It is a large long-range weapon used by Arachne insects, which releases a conductive lightning chain that connects to a group of enemies and defeats them with electric shock.
LanguageData.ARA_RW_Basic_Fist_Icez_Gun.label: Weapon organ "Ice spray gun"
LanguageData.ARA_RW_Basic_Fist_Icez_Gun.description: A ranged weapon used by the Arachne Insects, this weapon fires a jet beam that can rapidly cool targets. Compared to those found in the Symbiotic Muscles, this hand-held version is more focused on controlling a specific target than on killing or injuring them.
LanguageData.ARA_MW_Mimic_Niddle.label: Weapon organ "Pseudowire Poison Needle"
LanguageData.ARA_MW_Mimic_Niddle.description: It is the basic melee weapon used by Arachne nematode insects, and is connected to the limb through multiple exposed nerve bundles. This stinger contains dormant Arachne pseudonematode eggs, and attacks infect the target, eventually turning it into a parasite that can be manipulated by the pseudonematode.
LanguageData.ARA_MW_Mimic_Niddle.tools.0.label: cutting
LanguageData.ARA_MW_Mimic_Niddle.tools.1.label: piercing
LanguageData.ARA_Psi_Conductor_Turret.label: psychic conductor
LanguageData.ARA_Psi_Conductor_Turret.description: The Arachne oriental species will attack the enemy through this colonistâ€”this attack does not depend on the colonist's status, and will attack normally if it is not in melee combat.
LanguageData.ARA_Psi_Conductor_Turret_ArcBeam.label: Mote
LanguageData.Bullet_ARA_Psi_Conductor_Turret.label: psycho arc
LanguageData.ARA_Shell_Thorn_Turret.label: Throne Turret
LanguageData.ARA_Shell_Thorn_Turret.description: It is a semi-autonomous organ on the shell of Arachnidae that can fire automatically.
LanguageData.Bullet_ARA_Shell_Thorn_Turret.label: small throne
LanguageData.ARA_Fighter_Base_Turret.label: acid nest
LanguageData.ARA_Fighter_Base_Turret.description: It is a symbiotic organ in the body of the Arachne warrior species.When an enemy approaches, it automatically releases acidic seeds.
LanguageData.ARA_Praetorian_Base_Turret.label: acid nest
LanguageData.ARA_Praetorian_Base_Turret.description: It is a symbiotic organ that is built into the body of the Arachne species.When an enemy approaches, it automatically releases acidic seeds.
LanguageData.ArachnaeBase_Race_Acidcut_Proj.label: arachne acid spp.
LanguageData.ARA_Skyraider_Hivelord_Turret.label: skyraider nest
LanguageData.ARA_Skyraider_Hivelord_Turret.descriptio: It is a symbiotic organ of the Arachne lord species that automatically projects Tenshu Seinsuke insects when it is near an enemy.
LanguageData.ArachnaeBase_Race_Skyhive_Proj.label: Arachne Tensu species
LanguageData.ARA_Skyraider_Empthrower_Turret.label: magnetophobic nest
LanguageData.ARA_Skyraider_Empthrower_Turret.descript: It is a symbiotic organ possessed by the Arachne Volcano species, which automatically projects magneto-violent seeds when it is near an enemy.
LanguageData.ArachnaeBase_Race_Empthrower_Proj.label: Arachne magneto-violent species
LanguageData.ARA_RW_Icez_Mortar.label: Weapon organ "Frost Star Cannon"
LanguageData.ARA_RW_Icez_Mortar.description: A large long-range weapon used by the Arachne insects, which fires an air mass of extremely cold frost.Enemies that come into contact with it will experience a frost explosion, and although they will not die instantly if frozen, the fragile ice statue will be immediately destroyed by subsequent attacks from outside.
LanguageData.Bullet_ARA_RW_Icez_Mortar.label: large frost fog group
LanguageData.ARA_Arc_Beam_Mote.label: Mote
LanguageData.ARA_RW_Lighting_Cannon.label: Weapon organ "cryo lens tube"
LanguageData.ARA_RW_Lighting_Cannon.description: This is a special long-range weapon organ that only appears in Arachne's symbiotic muscle group. This weapon emits a jet that rapidly cools the target, inflicting significant damage and immobilizing it. Due to its pre-cooling mechanism, it requires a long preparation time before launching an attack.
LanguageData.Mote_ARA_RW_Lighting_Cannon_Beam.label: Mote
